author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 45-year-old man, Vishnu Prabhu, attempted suicide by self-immolation on the Collectorate premises here on Wednesday.

Police said that the man from Arapalayam was dejected over lack of action on repeated petitions he had submitted to the Collectorate against his aunt over a land grabbing dispute. The victim who suffered 20 percent burns has been admitted to the Goverment Rajaji Hospital. He had claimed that his aunt Kasiammal had denied his mother’s share in the ancestral property of four cents each in Kalavasal and Vilangudi. The Tallakulam police are investigating

Mason killed

Marimuthu (25) of Vilachery was killed when a private school van hit his motorcycle on Tirupparankundram Road on Wednesday evening.

Police said that the victim, a mason, was riding the motorcycle near Mannar Thirumalai Naicker College around 4 p.m.
title: Suicide bid over property row
